android.car.hardware

类 CarMixManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.hardware.CarMixManager

  • public class CarMixManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CarMixManager可以使用其他任意Manager中定义的ID
    部分APP在使用不同的ID时,需要同时创建多个Manager,比较混乱,在使用ID不多,但是ID又比较分散的情况下,可以选择使用此Manager
    接口的使用方式,和其他Manager的方法类似,ID的使用参考各个Manager里对应的定义

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • setIntProperty

        public void setIntProperty(int propertyId,
                           int area,
                           int val)
                    throws CarNotConnectedException
        设置int类型数据
        参数:
        propertyId - Manager中定义的ID
        area - ID有定义的,选择对应的areaId,没有要求的默认0,另外area=VehicleAreaType.VEHICLE_AREA_TYPE_GLOBAL的,也用0
        val - 对应需要设置的值
        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getIntProperty

                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(CarMixManager.CarMixEventCallback callback)

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • toIntArray

        public int[] toIntArray(java.lang.Integer[] array)
